fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Pit 2 players together in a fight at night. The person with the higher attack level will win the fight and gain basic defense for the night while the loser will be dealt an attack of the winnerâ€™s attack level

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If both players are tied in attack power, deal a powerful attack to both
-With the necronomicon, you may make up to 4 players fight each other instead
